body_html: Also, I would just add that the linguistic distinction between requires_grad and retain_grad is a little confusing (in fact, the confusion partially caused me to file this issue in the first place, I suppose). Maybe requires_grad should be something like grad_intermediary or something way more melodic, word-wise, to communicate the point that it will have a gradient flowing through it, but it will not actually keep it stored after the gradient has flowed.

body: Also, I would just add that the linguistic distinction between `requires_grad` and `retain_grad` is a little confusing (in fact, the confusion partially caused me to file this issue in the first place, I suppose). Maybe `requires_grad` should be something like `grad_intermediary` or something way more melodic, word-wise, to communicate the point that it will have a gradient flowing through it, but it will not actually keep it stored after the gradient has flowed.
